title: hack3rcon
author: hack3rcon
content: Hello,Which is your choice from the list below?BonkAIDOGEVETPlease tell me briefly and with the reason.Thank you.

comments.author: batang_bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: hack3rcon on December 10, 2023, 05:38:56 AMHello,Which is your choice from the list below?BonkAIDOGEVETPlease tell me briefly and with the reason.Thank you.None because it seems too late. Bonk has gained alot and if you are wanting to invest to any of them, you are surveying on which is a good one. It is likely that you will get some advises exactly from the ones who has invested on them already.Anyway, for me the most gain that I have seen is with bonk these past few days. I haven't check the others though.

comments.author: bluebit25
comments.body: I only know memecoin about BONK, AIDOGE but VET has never heard of it or maybe I'm misunderstanding. If it's VeChain then I don't think there's much need to compare because of course I'm not a person who likes to exaggerate fomo with memes so a Crypto that operates at its core will always receive support, that is my personal opinion.But going back to BONK and AIDOGE, both of them are getting a lot of attention, especially BONK about the things surrounding SOL. But if we look at AIDOGE, I also think that its supporters will have a way to fomo the upcoming process with Arbitrum.

comments.author: God bless u
comments.body: Quote from: hack3rcon on December 10, 2023, 05:38:56 AMHello,Which is your choice from the list below?BonkAIDOGEVETPlease tell me briefly and with the reason.Thank you.All three tokens are not listed in Binance which is the reason people still buying with hoping that one day anyone of the token will list in Binance and their investment will rise in with just one announcement. among all three I think Bonk is looking worthy because Solona trend is going on which will attract many investors in this meme coin. I don't think anyone will gives big profit like Shiba Inu or doge because tokens already get suitable marketcap. As for AIdoge I think it is not more interested while I don't know about VET.

comments.author: kentrolla
comments.body: I wouldn't be going with BONK as investing into these coins is like investing into it just by assuming one day if these gets listed on Binance exchange then we may get huge profit and I have decided to stay away from meme coins and AIDOGE is not on my list now as I feel it has been overbought and may go down anytime. I would prefer VET (Vechain) if I have to choose between these as there are higher possibilities of this coin being revived as it was one of the top altcoins during the previous bull run. But unfortunately couldn't capitalize the market. I feel it has possibilities though not my preferred coin but out of three coins you have mentioned I would choose VET.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Quote from: hack3rcon on December 10, 2023, 05:38:56 AMHello,Which is your choice from the list below?BonkAIDOGEVETPlease tell me briefly and with the reason.Thank you.If you asking this question then I assume you have already invested in all three. You trying to find out whether your judgement was correct or not. If it was me then I would not invest any of the three. The reason being that adding AI before Dodge doesn't make it similar to to the famous memecoin. VET has been in existence for a long time now and I don't think it has the potential to pump just like NEO. Bonk, I am unaware about it and won't look into a new project before halving. I would wait till halving is completed and then check the market for new coins and trends.

comments.author: AnonBitCoiner
comments.body: Everyone will think desperately because every individual prefer that coin which seems profitable for him. Meme coins are not much interested but the token like Shiba inu and doge performed well thats why people alter their mind according to situations.BONK and AIdoge are a good candidates and in coming Bull season they will pump but I think BONK will be more profitable than AIdoge. the main reason behind the better activity and increase desire of holders for BONK token is that it is formed on the basis of Solana therefore in my opinion BONK is more better meme coins among all these coins.

comments.author: terizla
comments.body: Quote from: God bless u on December 10, 2023, 07:32:58 AMAll three tokens are not listed in Binance which is the reason people still buying with hoping that one day anyone of the token will list in Binance and their investment will rise in with just one announcement. This is not the reason to all holders hope their tokens will listed on Binance. Binance is top exchange but not every token list at Binance will rise. Bonk and AIDOGE not listed in Binance but, their price is rise.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: Bonk and AIDoge got some attention lately so you're probably one of those feeling the FOMO. They will probably get a second or third wind but I would treat them as a lottery ticket that you buy and hope for a jackpot. You spend a small amount and see what happens next. VET is what I would consider as an investment.

comments.author: Bureau
comments.body: Quote from: Yogee on December 10, 2023, 01:00:11 PMBonk and AIDoge got some attention lately so you're probably one of those feeling the FOMO. They will probably get a second or third wind but I would treat them as a lottery ticket that you buy and hope for a jackpot. You spend a small amount and see what happens next. VET is what I would consider as an investment.I did check both of them and VET's overall performance in the market using coinmarketcap.com. Investing in VET is a big blunder as the last time it reached a high was in 2021 of a few cents. I do not understand why anyone would be interested in buying this coin. The developers have done nothing with it and so the investors are doing, as they are waiting to get out.Bonks made a comeback as Solana did it for itself, without the Solana blockchain it would not have made a comeback. It is still very down from its original position in USD and this is just a short comeback as coins like it have a big market supply. Coming back to what OP asked, I feel it is not a good project to invest for now. Wait and watch the trend. I do not like AIDoge as the name suggests it is a pump and dump coin without any practical reasoning to support it. I won't be investing in any of the three coins that you have listed.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: They are all meme coins so don't expect a ground breaking technological reason behind why this tokens will do well other than they have strong community support.Before I use ignore investing on meme coins but not anymore.  Am a bonk holder and will continue to hold till the bull run, this is  NFA by any means but personally am not ready to miss out the hype of this meme coin. The speculation is to push it to 10b mcap and I don't want to miss out on that even though I entered a bit late, I have made some profit already. I know someone who invested $5 on bonk and so far has turned to $100+ My point is, meme can be a good way of making profits if you find the right one to invest a small amount on.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: Quote from: Bureau on December 10, 2023, 01:31:00 PMQuote from: Yogee on December 10, 2023, 01:00:11 PM[...] VET is what I would consider as an investment.I did check both of them and VET's overall performance in the market using coinmarketcap.com. Investing in VET is a big blunder as the last time it reached a high was in 2021 of a few cents. I do not understand why anyone would be interested in buying this coin. The developers have done nothing with it and so the investors are doing, as they are waiting to get out.Before you consider something as bad or good investment then at least look beyond what the price and chart shows you. Are you expecting the developers to create hype so this coin could pump? That is dumb since price is beyond their control. I would sell immediately if I see the dev team speculating on price. Their focus should be working on the products that investors would take interest in and I can see them doing that.

comments.author: Publictalk792
comments.body: In my point of view these are just the shit coins. And do not have any hype like others have. So you should keep away from these kind of coins. You have many options you can select one of them. These coins are not listed on Binance too. I know this is not compulsory for a good coin to be listed on Binance. But if you still want to invest in these coins so I will recommend to make your own research. Means you should check their developments their team. Their purpose. After this research you think you should invest so you can. Because if you will trust on yourself so you will be succeeded.

comments.author: btc78
comments.body: as of now bonk is the one out of the three showing signs of increasing price i personally would not want to buy bonk even if it’s rising because it’s quite hard to predict if it’s still gonna go up if you are looking for a long-term investment bonk is not probably the best option but if you are looking for some quick profit then you may want to watch bonk carefully

comments.author: ultrloa
comments.body: Quote from: batang_bitcoin on December 10, 2023, 07:05:41 AMQuote from: hack3rcon on December 10, 2023, 05:38:56 AMHello,Which is your choice from the list below?BonkAIDOGEVETPlease tell me briefly and with the reason.Thank you.None because it seems too late. Bonk has gained alot and if you are wanting to invest to any of them, you are surveying on which is a good one. It is likely that you will get some advises exactly from the ones who has invested on them already.Anyway, for me the most gain that I have seen is with bonk these past few days. I haven't check the others though. Exactly and I guess anyone need to pass on this since they might done with it and the same with other abandon project those token will be the same. So if they want to play with shitcoin market maybe they should try to invest on newly launch token since this would provably give them more higher chances to earn rather those tokens which already accumulate a huge price rise since provably the next thing will happen to it will be abandoning of the said project since this is common thing happened to those scam projects and their devs will create another token so that they can earn a lot of money again from the hype brought up by meme shitcoin craze happening especially when bull run season is about to happen.

comments.author: Venik
comments.body: None of them, it's all just memecoins that I never heard of, and as I can see they are not brand new. So doesn't seem like there creators are promoting them enough to make huge gains.

comments.author: ice18
comments.body: Quote from: Venik on December 11, 2023, 11:24:58 AMNone of them, it's all just memecoins that I never heard of, and as I can see they are not brand new. So doesn't seem like there creators are promoting them enough to make huge gains.Why not? yes they are meme/joke coins but don't underestimate the power of memes, look at Doge last bullmarket many holders become millionaires just from a shitcoin. For me I will select VET and BOnk to hold , bullrun is just starting we can hope to see a lot of pump in the next phase of bullmarket so decide now.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Not sure though vet is quiet but bonk and aidoge are quality memecoins. But didnt able to get hands on of these tokens. Maybe aidoge but already sold mine since then not sure if its performing well now. Made a chunk of profits from it. But definitely bonk is something since its a solana eco and now that they are on airdrop season most likely solana shitcoins are probably driving it now.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Op I believed this can solve your question. This is the results from the research I made from the three meme coins you displayed here. Bonk price for now $0.00001157AIdoge price now $0.000000000201373 VET price as of now $0.02675159And from the above coins with their prices, VET is the best coin to invest it because it has the highest market price and market cap. In the cryptocurrency ecosystem space, everyone invest in the coins that has more value in the market so that in the nearest future the coin will do well and investors will be happy to interesting in it.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: I got $20 worth AIDOGE airdrop, sold it. VET is pretty old coin, it was there in 2017 time, but right now there is no hype around it (I hope you meant VeChain with VET here, and I'm not misunderstanding you).Bonk is funny name, but that's all, ain't gonna dive there.
